title: Graphic Designer Intern
description:
Are you the kind of person who critiques fonts on street signs and color grades your Instagram stories? Then we want you on our team!

We’re looking for a design-savvy intern who can help us turn ideas into eye-catching visuals. From social media creatives to branding magic, you’ll get your hands digitally with real projects and real impact.
responsibilities: Experiment with colors, typography, and layouts
Collaborate with our fun-loving marketing & content team
Learn, grow, and maybe even teach us a thing or two!
requirements: A curious mind and a love for good design
A sense of humor and a meme or two up your sleeve
